user_id.about: The ID of the user for whom to return results for. Helpful for disambiguating when a valid user ID is also a valid screen name.

screen_name.about: The screen name of the user for whom to return results for. Helpful for disambiguating when a valid screen name is also a user ID

reverse.about: Set this to true if you would like owned lists to be returned first. See description above for information on how this parameter works.
